name: backend
description: Family TodoApp backend - Node.js/Express + PostgreSQL + Prisma

scripts.start: npx prisma@5.19.0 migrate deploy && node src/server.js
scripts.build: npm uninstall prisma @prisma/client && npm install prisma@5.19.0 @prisma/client@5.19.0 --save-exact && npx prisma@5.19.0 generate
scripts.postinstall: npm uninstall prisma @prisma/client && npm install prisma@5.19.0 @prisma/client@5.19.0 --save-exact && npx prisma@5.19.0 generate
